owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: Amount to add (positive) or subtract (negative via int256)

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit liquidity to pool (only owner for now, can be extended for LP tokens)

payProfit(address,uint256).notice: Pay profit to trader (called by trading contract)

receiveFundingFee(uint256).notice: Receive funding fees (called by trading contract)

receiveLoss(uint256).notice: Receive loss from trader (called by trading contract)

receiveTradingFee(uint256).notice: Receive trading fees (called by trading contract)

updateOpenInterest(bool,int256).notice: Update open interest (called by trading contract)

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw liquidity from pool (only owner for now)
